UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Killing of Staphylococcus aureus and Salmonella enteritidis and neutralization of lipopolysaccharide by 17-residue bovine lactoferricins: improved activity of Trp/Ala-containing molecules.
Literature.Author: Hao Y, Yang N, Wang X, Teng D, Mao R, Li Z, Wang J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli CVCC 195(MIC=64µg/ml),Escherichia coli CVCC 1515(MIC=64µg/ml),Escherichia coli O157:H7 CICC 21530(MIC=64µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=128µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis CVCC 3377(MIC=4µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Pullorum CVCC 1789(MIC=>128µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Pullorum CVCC 1802(MIC=>128µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Choleraesuis CVCC 503(MIC=128µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CICC 10419(MIC=>128µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CICC 21630(MIC=>128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=>128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=2µg/ml),Streptococcus suis CVCC 606(MIC=128µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium CMCC 1.2136(MIC=32µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=32µg/ml)
